page.title: 05Gotherington School 2
page.content: The school is organized into 4 classes one of which is taught by two teachers.There is a Head, Deputy Head, and a Scale 2 post for Art & Craft. There is also a Scale 1 post and one teacher who teaches .5 of the time. Falling numbers and amalgamation onto one site have meant a reduction in staffing which, at one time, stood at 7 full-time members. The curriculum is broadly based and aims to give the children experience of a wide range of activities. A recent influx of new equipment means that we are now one of the best equipped schools in the county and have been able to expand the curriculum slightly.Activities are carried on after school and include gymnastics, netball, badminton, drama, athletics, cricket, cycling & orienteering.Extra music activities are given in the lunch hour.
